education.qualification: B.A. Hons, Economics and Business Management
A ‘level Economics, Law and Business Studies

education.institution: Blessed Edward Jones HS, Rhyl, N. Wales.

profile: An accomplished Commercial Director with a strong track record of driving profitable growth and delivering transformational results across CPG branded and own-label businesses. Skilled in leading high-performing teams across Sales, Demand Planning and NPD. Combining data-driven insight with innovative problem solving to deliver measurable, sustainable results in competitive, fast evolving Markets.

careerHistory.title: Commercial Director – UK & Ireland
points: Responsible for leading the Sales, NPD and Demand Planning functions consisting of 30 internal colleagues whilst engaging with numerous external partners/stakeholders.
Delivered YOY Volume and Value growth ahead of the Market - Companies Hse. Info. - 2022 £335m, 2023 £411m, 2024 £533m with 2025 expected £575m.

Developed and executed a 5-year commercial strategy focused on growing Core business, Channel and Category expansion, regional expansion, Acquisitional opportunities, Brand distribution/development and Operational effectiveness.

Created new ways of working across the three key Commercial functions that supported the growth plan whilst delivering improved alignment, operational efficiency, high executional standards and Customer relationships.
Responsible for providing regular commercial updates to Private Equity Shareholders and working with this group to ensure alignment to Commercial plans in delivering the overall business objectives.

careerHistory.dates: October 2017 - October 2022 Retail, October 2022 - March 2023 FS
careerHistory.title: Customer Development Director – UK and Ireland
points: Performed as a key member of the McCain Retail and FS leadership team working cross functionally with Marketing, Category and Operational teams to develop organisational structures, strategies, Customer engagement, execution plans and Individual/Team performance to ensure delivery of the Brand, Channel and overall business objectives.

Led teams across Sales and Demand Planning delivering growth in Market Share (UK/Ire), Volume and Value growth while optimising investment. Through our teams we delivered best in class Customer Engagement which had a significant contribution to the successful implementation of our plans, proposition development/execution, Category initiatives and delivery and implementation of Brand Plans.
McCain GB revenue 2017 £511m, McCain GB revenue 2023 £713m (Companies Hse. Info)

competencies.name: Strategic Commercial Leadership
competencies.evidence: Defines and delivers end to end commercial strategy aligned to growth, profitability, and long-term market position in competitive fast-changing markets.

competencies.name: P&L Ownership and Profit Growth
competencies.evidence: Strong track record of full P&L accountability, driving revenue growth, margin improvement and operational efficiency.

competencies.name: Executive Team Leadership
competencies.evidence: Builds, leads and develops high performing cross functional teams, creating a culture of accountability, collaboration and continuous improvement.

competencies.name: Negotiation & Strategic Partnerships
competencies.evidence: Experienced in complex commercial negotiations and stakeholder management, securing mutually beneficial outcomes across customers, suppliers and partners.

competencies.name: Business Transformation & Change
competencies.evidence: Leads large scale transformation programmes including M&A integration, market expansion, portfolio optimisation and organisational change.

competencies.name: Data-Driven Decision Making
competencies.evidence: Uses commercial insight, market intelligence, and performance data to shape strategy and improve execution.

keyAchievements.name: Leadership
keyAchievements.evidence: Led high-performing Commercial teams across PLC, Private Equity supported, and Family-Owned businesses, delivering sustained revenue growth and improved commercial performance.

keyAchievements.name: Market Strategy & Execution
keyAchievements.evidence: Developed and executed data-led market strategies that exceeded growth targets and strengthened long-term competitive positioning.

keyAchievements.name: Operational Improvement
keyAchievements.evidence: Identified and implemented process and supply chain improvements that increased efficiency, improved service performance and enhanced profitability.

keyAchievements.name: Innovation & Growth
keyAchievements.evidence: Delivered innovative branded and private-label propositions across multiple customers, channels, and regions, driving entry into new markets and significant growth in core business performance.

earlierCareer.title: Retail National Account Controller - All Grocery Retail Customers
Retail National Account Controller (one year as SNAM Tesco, 3 years Controller, Asda, Coop, Aldi)
National Account manager, Morrisons, JS, Coop
Various account management and people management roles, across Retail, Field Sales and C&C/Wholesale
Territory representative responsible for calling on 300 independent retailers in the Manchester Area.
